CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B01

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: NHS Supply Chain acting as agent for NHS Business Services Authority

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: NHS Supply Chain acting as agent for NHS Business Services Authority

SHORT_DESCR.P: NHS Supply Chain seeks to establish a framework agreement to NHS Supply Chain depots and its Customer via the Stock, Blue Diamond and E-Direct routes for the following Pre-Operative Skin Preparation Products including, but may not be limited to: Razors, Pre-Operative Scrub Brushes, Sterile Skin Marker Pens and Surgical Skin Clippers and associated products.

Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be GBP 2 083.33 in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the Framework Agreement. The estimated value over the total framework agreement term is an estimated annual value of GBP 2 083.33 over a (2 + 2 year term) = GBP 8 333.32.
A double edge disposable non-sterile razor for use prior to a surgical procedure.

Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be circa GBP 66 366 in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement.
The following certification will be a requirement of the upcoming tender exercise and applicants will be required to include evidence of this with their tender submission.

ISO 9001:2015 or equivalent externally accredited and up-to-date quality standard certificate(s) to cover all segments of the Applicant's (and the product's) supply chain. This should include but not be limited to manufacturing storage and distribution. Further information in respect of certification requirements will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement. If such certificates are not in the name of the applicant then the applicant must supply a copy of agreements setting out the authority and responsibilities of all parties in the supply chain.
Skin Marker Pens with ruler (Gentian Violet, Sterile, Regular and Fine Tip, Capped, Disposable Ruler) for use to create a violet coloured line and enable pre-operative marking of the patient.

Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will circa GBP 455 085 in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement.
The following certification will be a requirement of the upcoming tender exercise and applicants will be required to include evidence of this with their tender submission.

ISO 9001:2015 or equivalent externally accredited and up-to-date quality standard certificate(s) to cover all segments of the Applicant's (and the product's) supply chain. This should include but not be limited to manufacturing storage and distribution. Further information in respect of certification requirements will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement. If such certificates are not in the name of the applicant then the applicant must supply a copy of agreements setting out the authority and responsibilities of all parties in the supply chain.

Single use scrub brushes intended for hand-held pre-operative cleaning by medical staff. 2 sided construction with stiff plastic bristles on one side and sponge on the other. The structure of the item should include molded indentation/side panel to improve grip in use. The Scrub Brush must be dry with a Nail Pick, Sterile and individually packaged.

Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be circa GBP 549 181 in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement.
The following certification will be a requirement of the upcoming tender exercise and applicants will be required to include evidence of this with their tender submission.

ISO 9001:2015 or equivalent externally accredited and up-to-date quality standard certificate(s) to cover all segments of the applicant's (and the product's) supply chain. This should include but not be limited to manufacturing storage and distribution. Further information in respect of certification requirements will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement. If such certificates are not in the name of the applicant then the applicant must supply a copy of agreements setting out the authority and responsibilities of all parties in the supply chain.
Fixed Head Surgical Clippers for trimming hair prior to a procedure (to include but not limited to: Clipper Unit, Charger Unit and Blades).

Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be circa GBP 498 891 in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement.
The following certification will be a requirement of the upcoming tender exercise and Applicants will be required to include evidence of this with their tender submission.

ISO 9001:2015 or equivalent externally accredited and up-to-date quality standard certificate(s) to cover all segments of the applicant's (and the product's) supply chain. This should include but not be limited to manufacturing storage and distribution. Further information in respect of certification requirements will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement. If such certificates are not in the name of the applicant then the applicant must supply a copy of agreements setting out the authority and responsibilities of all parties in the supply chain.
Pivoting Head Surgical Clippers:
Fixed Head Surgical Clippers for trimming hair prior to a procedure (to include but not limited to: Clipper Unit, Charger Unit and Blades).

Precise quantities are unknown. It is anticipated that initial expenditure will be circa GBP 513 808 in the first year of this framework agreement, however this is approximate only and the values may vary depending on the requirements of those bodies purchasing under the framework agreement.
The following certification will be a requirement of the upcoming tender exercise and applicants will be required to include evidence of this with their tender submission.

ISO 9001:2015 or equivalent externally accredited and up-to-date quality standard certificate(s) to cover all segments of the applicant's (and the product's) supply chain. This should include but not be limited to manufacturing storage and distribution. Further information in respect of certification requirements will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement. If such certificates are not in the name of the applicant then the applicant must supply a copy of agreements setting out the authority and responsibilities of all parties in the supply chain.

INFO_ADD.P: The purpose of this notice is to draw attention to a procurement that NHS Supply Chain intends to commence during the subsequent 12 months. The Invitation to Tender will be the subject of a separate notice and it is that notice to which potential suppliers will need to respond at the appropriate time.

The framework agreement between NHS Supply Chain and successful suppliers will reserve the right to purchase the same or similar supplies and/or services from suppliers not appointed to the framework agreement at its sole discretion.

Whilst it is anticipated that initial expenditure under any forthcoming procurement will be circa GBP 2 083.33 in the first year of the framework, this is approximate only and the values will be to such level as those purchasing under the framework agreement consider necessary to provide suitable requirements.
Pre-Operative Skin Preparation Products to include but not limited to:
a. disposable double edge pre operative razors;

NHS Supply Chain expects to provide successful suppliers with the opportunity to offer additional savings to customers through the provision of discounted pricing, value added offerings and bulk buy initiatives. Supply Chain intends to enter into arrangements under which it will be entitled to purchase supplies and/or services which it will make available for purchase by:
3) any government department, agency or other statutory body; and/or
4) any private sector entity active in the UK healthcare sector. Only NHS Supply Chain can order from the framework agreement and enter into contracts under it.

NHS Supply Chain is currently considering the use of lots for this procurement. However, it reserves the right not to as part of any future tender process. Further information in respect of the lot strategy will be set out in the notice for the forthcoming procurement.

As part of its pre-tender strategy, NHS Supply Chain anticipates engaging with suppliers of these products. If you would like to contract with NHS Supply Chain in respect of the products which are the subject of this procurement then please contact June McMullan by registering your expression of interest and using the Intenda Messaging Centre via http://procurement.supplychain.nhs.uk/ISS
1. Use URL http://procurement.supplychain.nhs.uk/ISS/ to access the NHS Supply Chain Procurement portal.
— click on the “Not Registered Yet” link to access the registration page,
— complete the registration pages as guided by the mini guide found on the landing page.
— click on the “Applicant Dashboard” icon to open the list of new procurement events.
— view PIN content by clicking on the “View Notice” button for the procurement event. This opens a PDF document,
— express an interest by clicking on the “Express Interest” button.
— the Request for Information Document will then be sent to you via the Intenda Messaging Centre,
— applicants will need to return the Request for Information document 2 weeks from receiving the message viaISS Messaging System.

NHS Supply Chain anticipates holding pre-tender meetings with suppliers during 7.2018. If you would like to attend this event, please contact June McMullan via http://procurement.supplychain.nhs.uk/ISS to register your attendance.
